# JSONDecoder.KeyDecodingStrategy.useDefaultKeys

**Case**

A key decoding strategy that doesn’t change key names during decoding.

## Declaration

```swift
case useDefaultKeys
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder/KeyDecodingStrategy-swift.enum/useDefaultKeys] strategy is the strategy used if you don’t specify one.

## Built-in Decoding

- **JSONDecoder.KeyDecodingStrategy.convertFromSnakeCase**: A key decoding strategy that converts snake-case keys to camel-case keys.
